Text.Page: Tell Amarre that you must rescue the villagers.
Infused with Killian's power, Elleon faced Kalligar. <PCNAME> and Titus went after Elleon.

Yes, rescuing the people should be first. I'm sure that Elleon went for them as well.

, go with Titus and help Elleon."You're not coming?"

I'll go with Basheek and study the manufacture of the cure and gather more ingredients.

If I can work out the components of the cure, it'll be a great help for everyone at home.

I'll join you later.

Basheek said that our people are being held prisoner.

You came!

Elleon told me to wait here, but I was having second thoughts!

Elleon went to the cages above the valley. Please go and help Elleon!

Aaargh!

Oh it's you...this place is a living hell...

There was a lot of screaming and yelling above...be careful!

It's relief to see you here.

Elleon went to the cages up the valley. I thought I just heard a loud noise...

I think the draakons are here now.

Please! Teach those reptiles a lesson and save our people!

! I didn't think you'd come so quick.

I think we've recovered all of the people. Now, we must get out of here.

I'll lead the way. You make sure that the people go to a safe place.

Urgh!"Are you all right?"

I think something's happening to Elleon.

I think we should help him. Free Exodor will take care of the people.

Hurry. We must not lose Elleon.

A garden is the last thing I thought I'd see here.

Look at the size of those flowers. Maybe it's for those enormous butterflies?

But I thought that they only ate animals?

We should go....This place gives me the creeps.
